text:
Hi
I'm looking to integrate my Web Form to HubSpot using the API recommended in <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form>
It works well
But the biggest drawback of this API is that there is NO AUTHENTICATION
Anyone who knows or intercepts the API call from the Website will find out the Portal ID & Form Guid and can flood my HubSpot instance with lot of Form Submissions

Any reason this API is designed this way ? How to secure it ?
Hi is it possible to get the report on all calls  made using HubSpot ?
is there a  way to get the list of all marketing email replaies from HubSpot api

Hi all! Does anyone know if it possible to set up a custom integration between HubSpot and another platform in a similar fashion to that of the Salesforce integration? To be more specific, I would like to be able to create a custom dashboard for my integration from within HubSpot where you can update things like property mappings or sync settings (see screenshot). I have not found any resources explaining how I might go about this. Is this just not possible for regular HubSpot users or am I missing something?

Hello everyone!
I'm working on HubSpot calling extension and according to official docs here:  <https://github.com/HubSpot/calling-extensions-sdk#get-your-app-ready-for-production>
when I send POST request I'm receiving following error:
{"status":"error","message":"Writes to call settings data only accepted on <http://api.HubSpot.com|api.HubSpot.com>","correlationId":"2e2e581b-50f6-49ae-bf9d-afedbcc52742"}
How can I send this data? GET request is working just fine but I wonder how to create those settings via API? Do I have to configure something earlier?

Hi everyone. I’m trying to get data from an external application (Openforce) which has webhooks that will send a POST request to an endpoint. I’ve entered my URL in their site- and HubSpot is creating new contacts, but there is no data in them. Can someone help a rookie start populating data here?
